typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Paulo Coelho's masterpiece tells the mystical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The new uplifting book from Matt Haig, the New York Times bestselling author of The Midnight Library, for anyone in search of hope, looking for a path to a more meaningful life, or in need of a little encouragement."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "shoes worn by Michael Jordan in a friendly match hosted by Nike. These shoes were used in a moment that was both shocking and amazing when MJ did a slam dunk hard enough to break the backboard ring. These shoes become memories for unforgettable moments for every basketball fan who witnessed at the time."
